Class UserProfile

java.lang.Object
healthyBites.model.UserProfile
public class UserProfile extends Object
This class represents a user's profile in the HealthyBites app. It stores personal details like name, date of birth, email, etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    UserProfile(String name, String sex, String email, String unitOfMeasurement, Date dob, double height, double weight)
    Constructor to create a new user profile.

    • UserProfile

      public UserProfile(String name, String sex, String email, String unitOfMeasurement, Date dob, double height, double weight)
      Constructor to create a new user profile.
      Parameters:
      name - the user's name
      sex - the user's sex
      email - the user's email
      unitOfMeasurement - unit of measurement (imperial/metric)
      dob - the user's date of birth
      height - the user's height
      weight - the user's weight
